name: Chicken Piccata with Spinach
ingredients: 3 boneless chicken breasts, pounded very thin
2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice (1 small lemon)
3 ounces fresh baby spinach, large stems removed

instructions.en: Season the chicken with salt and pepper on both sides.
Heat 2 tablespoons oil in a very large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add the chicken and brown 1 minute on each side. Remove chicken to a plate and keep warm.
In the same skillet, heat the remaining tablespoon of oil and the butter.
Saut√© the mushrooms, shallots, garlic and capers for 5 minutes.
Add the wine, broth and lemon juice. Heat through and adjust seasoning if necessary.
Divide the raw spinach among 3 dinner plates. Top each bed of spinach with a chicken breast.
Pour the mushroom sauce over everything.

notes: This recipe makes 3 servings. Do not freeze. The warm sauce will wilt the spinach. For better browning, consider cooking the chicken for 30 seconds on high heat per side.
